attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its about time we joined the euro !! its better for our industry and people going on holiday , if we are going to be in europe we should join in full not be torn between europe and america ! lets put it to the people and let them decide !!!!!!

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Adopt-Euro-now/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
